Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Let me list the documents and applications involved 1 Microsoft Word WindowQuarterlyReport docx at the start and end 2 Microsoft Word WindowDocument1 docx 3 Google Chrome WindowEmail Inbox 4 Adobe Acrobat WindowReportDraft pdf 5 Microsoft Excel WindowBudget2024 xlsx The user starts with Word QuarterlyReport then switches to another Word document Document1 then to Chrome email then to Acrobat PDF then to Excel Budget then back to Word Document1 and finally back to Word QuarterlyReport

Name: Hypothesis Generation - IND
Text: One approach is to consider that a case is a unit of work centered around a specific document or application For example when the user is focused on Document1 docx all related events TYPING SAVE etc until they switch away could be part of the same case But when they switch to another window that could be a new case

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: Alternatively maybe a case is defined by the document being worked on For example all events related to Document1 docx could be one case and all events related to QuarterlyReport docx could be another case The email and PDF could be separate cases

Name: Abductive Reasoning - PE
Text: So for Document1 docx the events are from 090000 to 090145 then again from 090600 to 090630 If we consider that the user is still working on the same document even if they switch away temporarily then these should be part of the same case Similarly QuarterlyReport docx is at the very start 085950 and then again at the end 090715 to 090815

Name: Inductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Possible mappings FOCUS Maybe not an activity in itself perhaps it indicates the start of working on a document TYPING Could be Editing or Typing content SAVE Saving document SWITCH Not an activity within a case CLICK Could be Opening email or Replying to email SCROLL Reviewing content HIGHLIGHT Highlighting text CLOSE Closing document

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Case 1 Document1 docx Case ID CaseDocument1 Events 1 090000 FOCUS Start Editing Document1 2 090030 TYPING Editing Document1 3 090100 TYPING Editing Document1 4 090115 SAVE Saving Document1 5 090615 TYPING Editing Document1 6 090630 SAVE Saving Document1 7 090700 CLOSE Closing Document1

Name: Validation - PE
Text: Total 7 5 2 4 4 22 One event is missing the initial FOCUS at 085950 We excluded it because it wasnt followed by any other actions on QuarterlyReport docx so its not part of the case Alternatively we could include it as a separate case but its likely just a transient event so excluding it is fine

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - PE
Text: Perhaps for documents we can use Open Edit Save Close For emails Open Read Start Reply Type Reply Send For PDF Review PDF for SCROLL and HIGHLIGHT For Excel same as Word This seems good
